name: @gin-quin/ai-client
description: A universal, easy-to-use AI client with unified interface for OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, and Groq.

scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun deploy:npm && bun deploy:jsr && bun run unbuild
scripts.deploy:npm: bun run build && bun publish --access=public --allow-dirty && bun run unbuild
scripts.deploy:jsr: bun run build && bun x jsr publish --allow-dirty --allow-slow-types && bun run unbuild
